body:
When creating the CRAN package fftwtools version 0.9-8, the most recent version can be checksumed is 0.9-7. (If the tar.gz is not from https://cran.r-project.org but from https://cran.rstudio.org, the latest version can be checksumed.)

```
spack create https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/fftwtools_0.9-8.tar.gz
  ==> This looks like a URL for fftwtools
  ==> Warning: Spack will not check SSL certificates. You need to update your Python to enable 
  certificate verification.
  ==> Found 6 versions of fftwtools:

  0.9-7  https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/fftwtools/fftwtools_0.9-7.tar.gz
  0.9-6  https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/fftwtools/fftwtools_0.9-6.tar.gz
  0.9-5  https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/fftwtools/fftwtools_0.9-5.tar.gz
  0.9-3  https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/fftwtools/fftwtools_0.9-3.tar.gz
  0.9-2  https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/fftwtools/fftwtools_0.9-2.tar.gz
  0.9-1  https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/fftwtools/fftwtools_0.9-1.tar.gz

  ==> How many would you like to checksum? (default is 1, q to abort)
```
title: Cannot checksum the latest version when creating CRAN packages
